Class LoadEvents

  • java.lang.Object
    • src.LoadEvents
  • public class LoadEvents
extends java.lang.Object
    This class is used to get Event from the Database and change the events to corresponding datatype.
    Author:
    Tam Thai Hoang

      • updateMonthDataEvent

        public static java.util.ArrayList<java.util.List<MonthCell>> updateMonthDataEvent​(java.util.ArrayList<java.util.List<MonthCell>> data,
                                                                                  java.util.Calendar cal,
                                                                                  User user)
        Get the month data from the database and return it as a list of MonthCell objects to show to the SwingCalendar.
        Parameters:
        data - An empty ArrayList of MonthCell objects to be filled with the data from the Database
        cal - The Calendar object to get the month data from
        user - The User object to get the events from
        Returns:
        The list of MonthCell objects to show to the SwingCalendar

                                                                User user)
        Get the week data from the database and return it as a list of WeekCell objects to show to the SwingCalendar.
        Parameters:
        weekData - The empty list of WeekCell objects to be filled with the data from the Database
        cal - The Calendar object to get the month data from
        user - The User object to get the events from
        Returns:
        The list of WeekCell objects to show to the SwingCalendar
